body.p: A new rescue CD project codenamed "Dolphin" heads off this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, followed by announcements of two new mailing lists for international Gentoo users. And there's more: Extracts from the developer community mailing list, a Gentoo spin-off covered in the South-American press, yet another special purpose Gentoo-based LiveCD from Switzerland, and of course the bug statistics, security announcements and new additions to the developer team. Enjoy!
